mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_number, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_date, notice_readCount, notice_file_name, notice_file_path, notice_file_size) values (notice_notice_number_seq.nextval, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_writer}, #{notice_date}, #{notice_readCount},#{notice_file_name}, #{notice_file_path}, #{notice_file_size})

insert into notice(notice_number, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_date, notice_readCount) values (notice_notice_number_seq.nextval, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_writer}, #{notice_date}, #{notice_readCount})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from notice
where notice_title like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
where notice_content like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'

select * from (select rownum rnum, g.* from (select * from notice
where notice_title like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
where notice_content like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
order by notice_number desc) g) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_readCount=notice_readCount+1 WHERE notice_number=#{notice_number}
update notice set notice_writer=#{notice_writer}, notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content} where notice_number=#{notice_number}

update notice set notice_writer=#{notice_writer}, notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, notice_file_name=#{notice_file_name}, notice_file_path=#{notice_file_path}, notice_file_size=#{notice_file_size} where notice_number=#{notice_number}
